Uses of Class
com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets.models.Secret

  • Packages that use Secret 
    Package Description
    com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets
    Package containing classes for creating SecretAsyncClient and SecretClient to perform operations on Azure Key Vault.
    com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets.models
    Package containing classes used for representing secrets, deleted secrets and their attributes in Azure Key Vault.

    • Uses of Secret in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets

      Methods in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets that return Secret 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Secret SecretClient.getSecret(SecretProperties secretProperties)
      Get the secret which represents secretProperties from the key vault.
      Secret SecretClient.getSecret(String name)
      Get the latest version of the specified secret from the key vault.
      Secret SecretClient.getSecret(String name, String version)
      Get the latest version of the specified secret from the key vault.
      Secret SecretClient.recoverDeletedSecret(String name)
      Recovers the deleted secret in the key vault to its latest version and can only be performed on a soft-delete enabled vault.
      Secret SecretClient.restoreSecret(byte[] backup)
      Restores a backed up secret, and all its versions, to a vault.
      Secret SecretClient.setSecret(Secret secret)
      The set operation adds a secret to the Azure Key Vault.
      Secret SecretClient.setSecret(String name, String value)
      The set operation adds a secret to the Azure Key Vault.
      Methods in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets with parameters of type Secret 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mono<Secret> SecretAsyncClient.setSecret(Secret secret)
      The set operation adds a secret to the key vault.
      Secret SecretClient.setSecret(Secret secret)
      The set operation adds a secret to the Azure Key Vault.
      Mono<Response<Secret>> SecretAsyncClient.setSecretWithResponse(Secret secret)
      The set operation adds a secret to the key vault.
      Response<Secret> SecretClient.setSecretWithResponse(Secret secret, Context context)
      The set operation adds a secret to the Azure Key Vault.

    • Uses of Secret in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets.models

      Subclasses of Secret in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets.models 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeletedSecret
      Deleted Secret is the resource consisting of name, recovery id, deleted date, scheduled purge date and its attributes inherited from Secret.
      Methods in com.azure.security.keyvault.secrets.models that return Secret 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Secret Secret.setProperties(SecretProperties properties)
      Set the secret properties
